api_list.api_description: Returns detailed information about a single coin.

required_parameters.name: coin_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency to retrieve data for (e.g., 'btc-bitcoin').

api_list.api_description: Get one or multiple pairs by chain and pair addresses.

required_parameters.name: chain_id
required_parameters.description: The blockchain chain id (e.g., ethereum, bsc, polygon).

query: Give me detailed information on Bitcoin and the available trading pairs on the Ethereum blockchain with addresses '0x7213a321F1855CF1779f42c0CD85d3D95291D34C'.
